0.1.name: wordpress/password-rules
0.1.description: This simple plugin allows the WordPress site administrator to enforce minimal password requirements on its user. You can specify a minimal password length. You can also demand that users input uppercase characters, digits or special characters. This only effects password changes. Existing passwords will not be validated.
